Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Circle

  • public class Circle
extends java.lang.Object
    A Circle class is designed to set center point, radius, and color of the circle.In addition,it calculates area, circumference, distance, and brightness of the circle.
    Author:
    Adilet Momunaliev

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Circle(double h, double k, double radius, int red, int green, int blue)
      This is constructor Circle ,which is defined by given center points, red ,green, blue colors and radius.

      • Circle

        public Circle(double h,
              double k,
              double radius,
              int red,
              int green,
              int blue)
        This is constructor Circle ,which is defined by given center points, red ,green, blue colors and radius.
        Parameters:
        double - h and k center points ,double radius, and int red, int green ,int blue colors
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if radius less or equal to zero and if colors such as red, green, and blue less then zero or greater then two hundred fifty five.
